card.name: Shadow Speaker

card.text: Equip costs you pay cost 1 less.

card.name: Shopkeeper

card.name: Singed the Mad Chemist

card.name: Zac the Secret Weapon
card.text: If Zac, the Secret Weapon was cast from your hand, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters. When Zac, the Secret Weapon dies, spawn X 0/1 green Ooze Minions where X was the number of +1/+1 counters on it. Sacrifice X Ooze creatures you control: Return Zac, the Secret Weapon from the graveyard to the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters. Only activate this ability during your upkeep.
